name: Root of the Problem (wevwyrm, ARIA VEIL, ann_isawake, NicolasBoyer, Dominic-Emond)
name_original: Root of the Problem (wevwyrm, ARIA VEIL, ann_isawake, NicolasBoyer, Dominic-Emond)
description:
Five years ago, the roots of a gigantic plant dug into ground and buildings alike, destroying life as we know it. You and your friends Vina and ShadowEdge12 need to survive and find out why it all happened.

Check out the soundtrack here! 

Submission for the Global Game Jam 2023!
